entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: antiforgery-validation, caching #61397
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-noop, https, mvc #61396
  • Perf improvement: json, json, json #61395
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes, https #61394
  • Min API Validation should skip endpoint parameters with FromServices attribute #61392
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2025-26682: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #61390
  • Min API Validation fails for some generic types #61388
  • Make XmlKeyDecryptionOptions public OR add KeyManagementOptions.XmlDecryptor property #61386
  • MapStaticAssets not working when combined with RequireAuthenticatedUser #61385
  • Virtualize component returns empty result in Firefox when being used in shadow DOM #61384
    Backlog
  • [FromForm] Complex objects with MinimalApi and AOT #61382
  • Min API validation fails for Record types #61379

Closed

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/8.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #61287
    8.0.16
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/9.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #61290
    9.0.5
  • IL Trimming in Blazor appears to require public default constructors #61387
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #61357
  • SginIn / SginUp Pages in Modal Blazor 9.0 #61365
  • [Unified Build] Signing of .js files in `microsoft.dotnet.web.projecttemplates.x.y.z.nupkg` #61376
  • Blazor SSR: Re-render side component causes "FormMappingScope 'Name' can't change after initialization". #61389

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix handling of record types in validations source generator #61402
    area-minimal, feature-validation
  • OpenAPI: merge multiple body content types into one operation #61401
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Revert "Revert "Revert "Revert "Update .NET build URLs"""" #61400
    area-infrastructure
  • MVC: Correct metadata type for formdata enum parameters #61399
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #61398
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0 #61393
    area-infrastructure, 9.0.x
  • [Blazor] Resolve collection for registered services once #61391
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Rename MapSchemasEndoints.cs to MapSchemasEndpoints.cs #61073
    community-contribution, area-networking, 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • Use Copy Constructor for JsonSerializerSettings #61251
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • feat: fetch TLS client hello message from HTTP.SYS #60806
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [release/9.0] Caching SERedis critical bugfix; defer HC metadata detection because of DI cycle #60916
    Servicing-approved, feature-caching, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 9.0.x
  • Revert "Revert "[release/8.0] Update remnants of azureedge.net"" #60352
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Revert "Revert "[release/9.0] Update remnants of azureedge.net"" #60353
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0.x
  • Add `NotFoundPage` to `Router` #60970
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
  • `HttpNavigationManager` no longer uses `NavigationException` #61306
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-navigation, 10.0-preview4
  • Skip some OpenAPI tests on Amd64 queue #61349
    area-commandlinetools
  • Add host.docker.internal and host.containers.internal to the dev cert SAN #61265
    area-commandlinetools
  • Add InvokeNew, GetValue & SetValue to JS interop API #61246
    area-blazor
